embeds.title: Hold Firm
embeds.description:
Rare Skill / 2 :e_champ: / The Champ

Gain 12 (17) **Block:p_block:**.
Gain 12 (16) **Counter:p_counter:.**
Gain 1 **Blur:p_blur:.**

messages.content: is pretty good 👍

block and damage and blur, what’s not to love?
Not really a complicated card
It's like a dash with blur
reminds me of uhh #deleted-channel
Which makes it pretty good
<dissolve> perhaps?

embeds.title: Dissolve
embeds.description:
Rare Skill / 2 :e_hermit: / The Hermit

Gain 12 (18) **Block:p_block:**.
**Block:p_block:** is not removed at the start of your next 2 turns.
**Exhaust**.

messages.content: somehow this is miles better than dissolve
maybe the fact that champ actually has the ability to gain the block to be kept
it also doesn't exhaust lol
yea but tbh its champ the fights over before that matters
Dissolve is like two <silent blur> taped together which somehow makes it strong enough to make it an exhaust card

embeds.title: Blur
embeds.description:
Uncommon Skill / 1 :e_green: / The Silent

Gain 5 (8) **Block:p_block:**.
**Block:p_block:** is not removed at the start of your next turn.

messages.content: omg blur syndrome caught before it even happened
I don't really get why dissolve exhaust when it's just duble the effect of a base game card for duble the cost at a higher rarity
hermit cards love to be really really disappointing like that
And yet he got another nerf
Oh well
yepp
Guy really is cursed for life
tbh calipers is pretty bonkers on curse build hermit
Speaking of cursed, new Shadow Cloak felt good to play
dissolve… is not really quite as broken, but can still get you two turns of “don’t worry about not drawing enough curses to block”
Hermit’s rares in general are not amazing tho
Barricade and Blur effects are very powerful on Curse build
I wouldn't say that. Adapt, Heroic Bravado, Eternal Form, Dead or Alive are pretty amazing
adapt is balls, heroic bravado is balls, eternal form was balls and is now even more balls, dead or alive is fine
A lot of them are gimmicky at best
dead or alive just provides gold unless you have a lot of energy gain and vigor/brawl/str to be working with
it’s solid pick any deck but not really bonkers unless you have that stuff
dead or alive usually gives u more gold than the cost of a rare card
adapt is clunky as shit
adapt was a billion times better when it was end of turn
energy relics and frontload cards help but it’s 3/2 cost that does nothing turn you play it
heroic bravado 90% of time you play once and then let it exhaust
2 draws for 1 play
amazing
so it’s worse gestalt

eternal form had similar clunk problems to adapt, but potency outweighted that in prev iteration - now it highly depends on deck cuz if you bring lot of cards that increase their cost it becomes useless
or lot of 0-costs I guess but that was same for prev eternal form too
eternal form is so fucking sad as a form card
could have had anything maybe something that helped but its just the most generic thing
sadder than deva form because watcher doesnt feel bad skipping rares
uh… other hermit rares… roundhouse kick is useful but never broken
magnum means you sac 7 draws to max its effect
me when magnum
it’s an option for multiplying vigor but you need so much draw to make it consistent
fatal desire is good only if you can deal with curses
Fatal desire is probably one of his best rares
overwhelming power is just frontload-if you can remove the debuffs it’s pretty useful, otherwise you have to play it as part of near-finishing combos to avoid eating tons of damage
Yeah and even it’s somewhat gimmicky since if you don’t have enough support or frontload it will lose you several elite fights
I would say so too. The draw is extra valuable, which makes me value curse exhaust a lot more on him
It's one of those cards that you take only if you know you know you can utilize it well
Like catalyst
Hm… oh theres that deal 5/7 damage randomly per exhausted card
Too bad Hermit only has Covet, Malice and Adapt for curse exhaust
except that solves literally nothing it’s like a pure I took no scaling card help me
And none of them exhausts more than 1 card
I feel like hermit needs more cards exhausting other cards
oh reprieve is ok I guess
heal is good and you can just let it exhaust if you don’t need it
Is it just me or too many Hermit rares deal damage?
those are the attacks I suppose
Black Wind, Dead or Alive, Final Canter, From Beyond, Magnum, Roundhouse Kick, Purgatory, Rough house
Hermit is just pure damage with little scaling in general
Imo at least
roundhouse kick isn’t really a damage card
it’s a util card
We can count Gambit too if we want
Yeah I guess attacks that do something else are fine. That would include roughhouse
black wind is actually a kind of interesting card as it is near detrimental when winning hard but really good when you are losing
I just wish Eternal Form would let us choose the 4 cards we like to play not the first 4 cards drawn
That would make it just +4 energy unconditional tbh
nearly
Yeah actually nvm
That was actually just back when Eternal Form read "The first 4 cards you play each turn cost 0. Gain no energy at the start of turn"
Now that I look at it
Wait no, back then 3 cost cards become 0 cost too under that condition
rip champ card discussion lol
the rage over the fact that hermit has had all the fun stripped from him consumes us
give champ a gun
Yeah feels like Hermit has been receiving nerfs after nerfs with barely any buffs to him despite already being weak enough
This all started from how Champ's Blur card is straight up better than Hermit's Blur card in every way possible
apart from the number of turns u get blur for lol

The champ sure does like having cards with big numbers. This works pretty well with the defense stance exit bonus (10 block), and is just generally solid to smooth out your turns and block for large amounts when you need to. It does feel weird to me that this doesn't exhaust, but it's not a huge deal. Not a card I would buy in a store, but always nice to have in your deck for consistency, a solid pickup at the end of act 1 or 2.
Yeah I felt like he felt about right when I started in March, and I think he's been absolutely gutted since then. Now I don't even enjoy the character.
It's a cool concept, but it struggles with block frontload and block scaling, and has like 2 ways of damage scaling after the major repeated bruise nerfs.
I really like how he doesn't have much energy gain, but instead cheats it in, and his cards work in unique ways, but too much of him feels very underpowered.
I can agree with most of that
But don’t say Eternal Form is crap
It’s basically “gain 4 energy at the start of each turn”
why does hermit want that tho
Who wouldn’t want that
a character who has a bunch of other cards which are really general
and all the scaling options are shit
Someone with bad draw and alternative ways of getting energy
literally never had a hermit deck where i felt "eternal form would really turn this around" or even that it would help in the slightest he just does not need it
like imagine if vault got taken out of watchers pool and replaced with eternal form
I’ve had Eternal Form work to great effect before
same
as snecko
Well then fuck deva form more
also its literally just future bullet time
and bullet time is shit
I stand by bullet time
Well this version of bullet time has no downside apart from delay

and giving up a rare card and giving up 1 draw and giving up an entire turns worth of energy
oh wait those are actual downsides
